numerical_repetition_strategic_numbers.description: AI favors 'attractive' numbers (9 for making-10, 5 for doubles, teen numbers like 13)
numerical_repetition_strategic_numbers.fix_template: Add CRITICAL NUMERICAL VARIATION warning at top, explicitly list problematic numbers to avoid (9, 10, 5, doubles, teens), provide good/bad examples
examples: 80% of percentages tasks used numbers 80 and 60

poor_objective_coverage.description: Only tests 1-3 of 5-6 stated learning objectives
poor_objective_coverage.fix_template: Add 'Learning Objective Coverage' section at TOP of concept with explicit list of all objectives. Add rotation instruction to cycle through objectives.
examples: Tested only counting, ignored place value, ordering, even/odd, estimation, number line
Tested only addition, ignored subtraction and word problems
Only tested addition, ignored subtraction and comparison
Percentages: tested only 3-4 of 6 objectives, ignored fraction conversion coverage
Ratios: tested only 3-4 of 7 objectives, missing ratio simplification and equivalence identification
Integers: tested only 2-3 of 7 objectives, ignored multiplication/division, absolute value, comparison/ordering

svg_layout_repetition.description: SVG layouts too similar across tasks (same arrangement patterns)
svg_layout_repetition.fix_template: Add explicit SVG variation instruction. Change prescriptive layouts to flexible options (e.g., 'rows of 5 or 10' â†’ 'various sizes and arrangements')

visual_pattern_repetition_colors.description: Color/shape patterns repeat (e.g., red-blue-red) even when numerical variation is good
visual_pattern_repetition_colors.fix_template: Add CRITICAL VISUAL VARIATION warning for non-numerical contexts. Demand variety in color sequences, shape combinations, pattern structures.
examples: Red-blue-red appeared in 4/5 pattern recognition tasks

problem_structure_repetition.description: Only uses 1-3 of 5+ available problem structure types
problem_structure_repetition.fix_template: Add 'Problem Type Rotation' instruction with explicit list of structures. Add good/bad examples showing variety expectations.
examples: Only 3 of 5 problem structures used in arithmetic tasks
Only used word problems and direct calculation
